content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'yellow_taxi_data_staging' AND schema_id = SCHEMA_ID('dbo'))
    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.yellow_taxi_data_staging (
        VendorID INT,
        tpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME,
        tpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME,
        passenger_count INT,
        trip_distance FLOAT,
        RatecodeID INT,
        store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
        PULocationID INT,
        DOLocationID INT,
        payment_type INT,
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        extra FLOAT,
        mta_tax FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        tolls_amount FLOAT,
        improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
        total_amount FLOAT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'rides/yellow',
        DATA_SOURCE = [new-york-taxi_nytaxidatastore2_dfs_core_windows_net],
        FILE_FORMAT = SynapseParquetFormat
    )
